body.content:
-- 
Greetings Friend

Please forgive me for writing you this letter to you  on this internet
media  based on  development at my bank which I will like to bring to
your personal that (8.5.million Euro claims ) This is a legitimate
transaction and The money will be shared 60% for me and 40% for you .
There is no one coming to ask you about the funds  the money will be
transfer to you
please quickly  email
My best regards .
Mohammed Haraq
